description: Composite numbers n such that digits of prime factors of n are either 2 or 9.
mathematica: pf29Q[n_]:=Module[{pfs=Union[Flatten[IntegerDigits/@Transpose[ FactorInteger[ n]][[1]]]]},MatchQ[pfs,{2}]||MatchQ[pfs,{9} ]| |MatchQ[pfs,{2,9}]]; nn=25000;Select[Complement[Range[nn],Prime[ Range[ PrimePi[nn]]]],pf29Q] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 23 2012 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Dec 15 1998.
